definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: come in, come, go in, go (As. bâ’u Hpt:KAT 499, Eth. bo0a: Ar. ba0’a return)—

come in, sq. [[אֶל]] Ge 6:18, Ge 7:9, Ge 7:13, sq. [[בְּ]] Ge 19:8 & so (subj. [[רוּחַ]]) Ez Eze 2:2, Eze 37:10, sq. [[לְ]] Es 6:4, sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. Ge 12:11, Ge 41:57, Nu 14:24, sq. acc. ([[בוֹת]]) Ju Jdg 18:18, 2Ki 11:19 cf. Ps 100:4 ([[שַׁעֲרָיו]]), & [[בָּאֵי שַׁעַר עִירוֹ]] Ge 23:10, Ge 23:18; even of life-less things 2Ki 18:21, [[וּבָא בְכַפּוֹ]] (of broken reed) = pierce; of food and drink (sq. [[אֶל־]]) Da 10:3 cf. Ge 41:21 (fat kine when eaten by lean kine); v. also (sq. [[בְּ]]) Nu 5:22, Nu 5:24, Nu 5:27; abs. Ge 7:16, Ge 24:31, 1Ki 1:42, 1Ki 14:6 cf. 2Ki 11:5, 2Ki 11:9 = 2Ch 23:4, 2Ch 23:8 +; more partic.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: opp. [[יׇחָא]], go out and come in (Sab. [[וחַאם או]] [[בהאם]] Hal:152) Jos 6:1, 2Ki 11:8 = 2Ch 23:7; esp. in sense of going about one's affairs (including all one's undertakings) De 28:6, De 28:19, Zec 8:10, Ps 121:8; id. + [[ישׁב]] 2Ki 19:27; also sq. [[לִפְנֵי הָעָם]] etc. = act as ruler (judge) of, Nu 27:17, 2Ch 1:10 cf. 1Ki 3:7; of leading an army 1Sa 18:13, 1Sa 18:16 cf. also Jos 14:11; v. further De 31:2, 1Sa 29:6 & sub

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: infr.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of taking part in worship of congregation De 23:2, De 23:3, De 23:3, De 23:4, De 23:4 + (sq. [[בְּ]]); or entering into tabernacle for priestly service Ex 28:29, Ex 28:35, Le 16:23 (all sq. [[אֶל־]]), Ex 28:30 (sq. [[לִפְנֵי יהוה]]), Le 16:17 (sq. inf.) +. c. of entering on official duty 2Ki 11:9 = 2Ch 23:8, 1Ch 27:1 (all opp. [[יחא]]). d. of bride coming into her husband's house Jos 15:18 = Ju Jdg 1:14. e. of entering a woman's tent or apartment (with implication coire cum femina, cf. ba0’un NH [[בִּיאָה]] coitio; on origin of this use of word cf. RS:K 90, 167, 291) Ju Jdg 15:1 [[אֶל־אִשְׁתִּי הֶחָָדְרָה]], Jdg 16:1, Ge 6:4, Ge 16:2, Ge 30:3, Ge 38:8, Ge 38:9, Ge 39:14, De 22:13, 2Sa 12:24, 2Sa 16:21, 2Sa 20:3, Ez Eze 23:44, Eze 23:44, Eze 23:44, Pr 6:29 (all sq. [[אֶל־]]); sq. [[עַל־]] Ge 19:31, De 25:5 [[יׇבאׁ עָלָיהָ]] [[וּלְקָחָהּ לוֹ לְאִשָּׁה]] cf. [[בָּאֶיהָ]] Pr 2:19; —subj. rarely woman Ge 19:34, 2Sa 11:4.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of associating with (sq. [[בְּ]] ) Jos 23:7, Jos 23:12 cf. Ge 49:6 [[בְּסׂדָם אַל תָּבאׂ נַפְשִׁי]] ([[אַל־תֵּחַד]] ‖[[בִּקְהָלָם ]]).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: of entering into specific relations, [[בְאָלָה]] ´[[בּ]], [[בִבְרִית]] ´[[בּ]] (v. [[אלה]], [[ברית]]); [[בּוֹא]] [[בְדָמִים]] come into blood-guiltiness, became guilty of murder 1Sa 25:26.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: of sun, set (go in, enter, cf. As êrib šanši COT Ge 19:23; opp. [[יחא]] go forth, rise) Ge 15:12, Ge 15:17, Ge 28:11, Ex 17:12, Ex 22:25, Le 22:7, De 16:6, De 23:12, De 24:13, De 24:15, Jos 8:29, Jos 10:13, Jos 10:27, Ju Jdg 19:14, Ec 1:5, 2Sa 2:24, 2Sa 3:35, 1Ki 22:36, 1Ki 18:34; so also fig. Je 15:9 of calamity [[בּאה שִׁמְשָׁהּ בְּעוֹד יוֹמָם]] (‖[[אֻמְלְלָה יׁלֶדֶת הַשִּׁבְעָה]] etc.), cf. Is 60:20; Mic 3:6 [[הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ עַל־הַנְּבִיאִים]] ´[[וּב]] of ignorance and confusion.

definitions.title: j
definitions.body: . of harvest, come in = be gathered Le 25:22 (cf. [[תְּבוּאָה]]); so of revenue (income) 1Ki 10:14 = 2Ch 9:13 (sq. [[לְ]] pers.),—opp. [[יחא]] be expended.

definitions.title: k.
definitions.body: in other phrases: [[וַתָּבאׁ הָעִיר בַּמָּחוֹר]] 2Ki 24:10 + and the city came into siege; cf. Ps 105:18 [[בַּרְזֶל בָּאָה]] [[נַפְשׁוֹ]] his soul came into iron (v. AV RVm; Che felt iron chains, cf. Ew Ol Hup Pe; Targum Hi De al. iron came upon his soul); [[בָּא בַּיׇּמִים]] come into (the) days, = advanced in age Ge 24:1, Jos 13:1, Jos 23:1 (all ‖[[זׇקֵן]]); on 1Sa 17:12 v. Dr.

come (approach, arrive) opp. [[הָלַח]] Ge 16:8, 1Sa 20:21 (cf. v:1Sa 20:22) Ne 6:17, Ec 5:14, Ec 5:15 (of birth opp. death); sq. [[אֶל־]] pers. vel rei Ge 14:7, Ge 37:23; sq. [[עַל־]] Ex 18:23, 2Ch 20:24 (come up upon, almost = ascend); cf. also Le 21:11, Nu 6:6; sq. [[לְ]] 1Sa 9:12 2Ch 29:17; sq. [[עַד]] Nu 13:22, Ju Jdg 15:14, 2Sa 16:5; cf. [[בָּאוּ בָנִים עַד־מַשְׁבֵּר]] 2Ki 19:3 = Is 37:3 children have come to the birth; sq. [[עַד]] + [[אֶל]] 2Ki 9:20 [[בָּא עַד אֲלֵיהֶם]]; sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. Ju Jdg 11:16, 2Ki 6:4; sq. acc. 1Sa 4:12, 2Ki 8:7, Je 32:24; cf. also La 1:4 [[בָּאֵי מוֹעֵד]] those coming to an appointed feast; abs. Ge 45:16 Joseph's brethren are come, & oft.; also of lifeless things, ark of ´[[י]] 1Sa 4:6; wind Job 1:19; so [[כַּסְפְּכֶם בָּא אֵלָָי]] Ge 43:23 your money came unto me = I received your money; our inheritance has fallen to us Nu 32:19 (c. [[אֶל־]]); so 1Sa 9:16 its cry is come unto me, cf. Ge 18:21, Ex 3:9, La 1:22; of time, often of imminent future, esp in phr. [[הִנֵּה יׇמִים בָּאִים]] Is 39:6 = 2Ki 20:17, Je 7:32, Je 9:24, Je 16:14, Je 19:6; cf. also 1Sa 26:10, Ez Eze 7:7 +; of day of ´[[י]] Joe 2:1, Joe 3:4, Zec 14:1, Mal 3:2, Mal 4:1, Mal 4:5; also ptcp. as adj. [[הַיׇּמִים הַבָּאִים]] Ec 2:16 cf. Je 47:4; as subst. [[הַבָּאוֹת]] Is 41:22 things to come, future things; & [[הַבָּאִים]] alone = adv. in (days) to come Is 27:6; partic.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: come with, i.e. come, bringing, sq. [[בְּ]]:[[אָבוֹא בֵיתְךָ בְעוֹלוֹת ]] Ps 66:13; ´[[אָבוֹא בִּגְבֻרוֹת אדני י]] Ps 71:16 (‖[[אַזְכִּיר חִדְקָֽתְךָ]]) so Le 16:3 & perh. Pr 18:6—cf. [[בְּ]]

definitions.title: III. 1. b. b
definitions.body: . come upon, fall or light upon, of enemy, attack, sq. [[עַל־]] Ge 34:27, 1Sa 11:12 cf. Ge 32:9 (sq. [[אֶל־]]); sq. sf. Job 15:21, so also Job 20:22, Ez Eze 32:11; of calamity, etc. Pr 10:24, Pr 28:22, Ps 44:18 (all c. sf.); sq. [[לְ]] Job 3:25 (‖[[אתה]] c. sf.) Is 47:9 (‖[[בוא על]]); of blessing, sq. [[עַל־]] Jos 23:15; sq. sf. Job 22:21 (cf. Di) Ps 119:41, Ps 119:77.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: come to pass, of signs, wonders, predictions, etc. De 13:3, Jos 23:14, 1Sa 9:6 ([[בּאׁ יׇבאׁ]]) Is 42:9, Je 28:9, Pr 13:12, Job 6:8 +.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: Ge 6:13 [[קֵץ כָּל־בָּשָׂר בָּא לְפָנַי]] perh. has presented itself before me (v. Kn), cf. La 1:22 supr. & 2Ch 7:11 (where [[בוא]] for usual [[עלה]]); but perh. (cf. Di) has come to pass before me, i.e. in my mind it is already a fact.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: † in phr. [[עַד־בּוֹאֲךָ עַזׇּה]] Ju Jdg 6:4 cf. Jdg 11:33, 1Sa 17:52, 2Sa 5:25, 1Ki 18:46 ([[עַד־בּׂאֲכָה]]) until thou comest to = as far as; so also [[בּוֹאֲךָ]] ([[בּׂאֲכָה]]) alone, = as far as, or in the direction of, Ge 10:19, Ge 10:19, Ge 10:30, Ge 13:10, Ge 25:18, 1Sa 27:8 (all sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc.) 1Sa 15:7; so [[לְבאׁ חֲמָת]] Nu 13:21, Nu 34:8, Ez Eze 48:1, cf. Ez Eze 47:15 (in a different connexion [[לָבוֹא אפרתה]] Ge 35:16, Ge 48:7); ´[[עַד לְבוֹא ח]] Jos 13:5, Ju Jdg 3:3, 1Ch 13:5, cf. 1Ch 5:9, 2Ch 26:8, Ez Eze 47:20; ´[[מִלְּבוֹא ח]] Am 6:14, 1Ki 8:65, 2Ki 14:25, 2Ch 7:8; of Isaac [[בָּא מִבּוֹא בְּאֵר לַחַי רׂאִי]]Ge 24:62 (but text dub.)

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: attain to [[וְעַד הַשְּׁלשָׁה]] [[לאׁ בָא]] 2Sa 23:19 = 1Ch 11:21.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: be enumerated [[הַבָּאִים בְּשֵׁמוֹת]], lit. those coming with names 1Ch 4:38.
go, i.e. walk, associate with ([[עִם]]) Ps 26:4, so c. [[אֵת]] Pr 22:24 (cf. [[הלך את]] Pr 13:20 & [[התהלך את]] Ge 5:22, Ge 5:24, Ge 6:9).

go (cf. [[הלך]]) from speaker, but with limit of motion given Is 22:15 [[לָח־בּאׁ אֶל־]], so Ez Eze 3:4, Eze 3:11; Ge 45:17 [[וּלְכוּ־באׁוּ]] [[אַרְחָה כְּנׇ֑עַן]]; 1Sa 22:5 [[לֵךְ וּבָאתָ־לְךָ אֶרֶץ יְהוּדָה]]; Is 47:5, Jon 1:3 [[אֳנִיׇּה בָּאָה תַרְשִׁישׁ]] a ship going to Tarshish; go to war [[יׇבאׁוּ לַמִּלְחָמָה]] Nu 32:6.

cause to come in, bring in (conduct, lead, obj. persons and animals), sq. [[אֶל־]] Ge 6:19, Ct So 2:4, So 3:4; sq. [[בְּ]] Le 26:41, Ps 66:11; sq. [[לְ]] Ju Jdg 19:21, 1Sa 9:22; sq. [[לִפְנֵי]] Es 1:11, Es 1:17; sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. Ge 24:67, Ge 46:7; sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] + [[אֶל־]] Ge 19:10, sq. acc. ([[חֶדֶר]]) Ct So 1:4, 2Ki 9:2; also bring, carry in (lifeless things), sq. [[אֶל־]] Nu 31:54, Mal 3:10; sq. [[בְּ]] Je 17:21; send, of sending (shooting) arrows (fig.) La 3:13; cf. Le 26:36; of sending breath ([[רוּחַ]]) into dry bones Ez Eze 37:5 (Co [[על]]); sq. [[לְ]] Ne 13:12; sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. Ex 26:33, 2Ki 20:20 [[וַיׇּבֵא אֶת־הַמַּיִם הָעִָירָה]]; sq. acc. ([[חֶדֶר]]) 2Sa 13:10; also 2Ch 15:18 ([[בֵּית]]); abs. 2Sa 6:17; partic.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: opp. [[הוֹחִיא]] (bring out) De 9:28 (sq. [[אֶל־]]); esp. in combination with [[הוֹחִיא]] lead out and in (to and from battle) Nu 27:17, 1Ch 11:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: bring in women as wives for sons (sq. [[מִן הַחוּץ]]) Ju Jdg 12:9 (opp. [[שִׁלַּח הַחוּחָה]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: bring into judgment [[וְאׂתִי תָבִיא בְּמִשְׁפָּט עִמָָּךְ]] Job 14:3 cf. Ec 11:9, Ec 12:4.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: cause sun to go down Am 8:9 (symbol of judgment).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: of harvest, bring in, gather 2Sa 9:10, Hag 1:6 (opp. [[זרע]]) cf. Ne 13:15.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: put staves into ([[בְּ]]) rings Ex 25:14, Ex 37:5, Ex 38:7 cf. Ex 26:11, Le 14:42; hand into ([[בְּ]]) bosom Ex 4:6, Ex 4:6; girdle into ([[בְּ]]) water Je 13:1.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: other phrases, [[הֵבִיאוּ חַוׇּ֠רָם]] [[בַּעֲבׂדַת אֲדׂנֵיהֶם]] Ne 3:5 put their necks to the work, etc.; fig. [[הביאו את־חואריכם בְּעׂל]] Je 27:12; [[הָבִיאָה]] [[לַמּוּסָר לֵבֶָּךָ]] Pr 23:12 apply to instruction thy heart; [[וְנׇבִא לְבַב חָכְמָה]] Ps 90:12 that we may gain a heart of wisdom.

cause to come, bring, bring near, etc. (animate obj.), sq. [[אֶל־]] Ge 2:19, Ge 2:22, Ge 43:9, Le 24:11, Nu 5:15; oft. of bringing Isr. to Canaan Ex 6:8, Ex 23:23 +, cf. Is 14:2, Is 56:7, Ne 1:9; abs. De 4:38, De 6:23; sq. [[לְ]] Ge 39:14, Ge 39:17; sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. Ez Eze 12:13; sq. [[הֲלֽם]] Ju Jdg 18:3, & [[עַד־הֲלֽם]] (fig. of Yahweh's prospering care) 2Sa 7:18 = 1Ch 17:16; abs. Ge 46:32; also with lifeless obj., Ge 27:10 (sq. [[לְ]]), so 2Ch 36:7; Ge 31:39 (sq. [[אֶל־]]); sq. acc. 2Ki 12:5, 2Ch 36:18, Da 1:2, Da 1:2; sq. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. Ex 26:33, Je 20:5; sq. [[לִפְנֵי]] 2Ch 24:14; of ravens bringing food 1Ki 17:6 (sq. [[לְ]]); of bringing presents Ge 43:26, 1Sa 9:7, 1Sa 10:27 (all sq. [[לְ]]); cf. 1Sa 17:18; esp. offerings, sq. [[לְ]] Ge 4:3, Nu 15:25, Ne 10:35, Ne 10:37 ([[לְבֵית]]), etc.; Le 2:2 sq. [[אֶל־]] of priest; abs. Ge 4:4, Le 4:32, Le 23:14, Le 23:15, Mal 1:13, Mal 1:13, 2Ch 31:5; cf. also Ex 35:21, Ex 35:22, Ex 35:23, Ex 35:24, Ex 35:24, Ex 35:27, Ex 35:29 (sq. [[לְ]] for) so Ex 36:3 +; of time, cause a day to come La 1:21; cause cry to come ([[עַל־]]) Job 34:28; = carry [[בָּנַיִךְ בְּחׂחֶן]] ´[[והב]] Is 49:22 (‖[[עַל־כָּתֵף נשׂא]]); carry God in ([[בְּ]]) the hand Job 12:6 (cf. [[אֱלהַּ]] p. 43); allow to come, almost = invite Es 5:12 (sq. [[אֶל־]]) cf. v:Es 5:10; partic.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. [[עַל־]] bring against, or upon, bring enemies against Je 25:9 cf. Ez Eze 23:22; obj. sword Le 26:25, Ez Eze 5:17, Eze 11:8, Eze 14:17, Eze 33:2; plague Ex 11:1; curse or calamity Ge 27:12, De 29:26, 1Ki 9:9 = 2Ch 7:22, Job 42:11 cf. Je 25:13, Je 36:31, Je 44:2, Je 49:8, Je 49:37, Ez Eze 14:22; sin Ge 20:9, Ge 26:10, Ex 32:21; cf. also sq. [[אֶל־]] Je 32:42, Je 49:36.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: bring to pass 2Ki 19:25 = Is 37:26 cf. 1Ch 4:10, Ps 78:29.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: bring, bring forward, bring on the scene Mic 1:15, Zec 3:8.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: bring for a purpose, sq. inf. Ps 78:71 [[מֵאַחַר]] [[עָלוֹת הֱבִיאוֹ לִרְעוֹת בְּיַעֲקׂב עַמּוֹ]].

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: bring, procure [[בְּנַפְשֵׁנוּ נׇבִיא לַחְמֵנוּ]] La 5:9. †

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: be brought in (of pers. and things), abs. Ge 43:18; sq. [[בית]] into a house Ge 43:18; temple 2Ki 12:5, 2Ki 12:10, 2Ki 12:14, 2Ki 12:17, 2Ki 22:4, 2Ch 34:9, 2Ch 34:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be brought, sq. [[לְ]] Ge 33:11 (but LXX rd Hiph. I have brought), Ps 45:15; sq. [[אֶל־]] unto Le 6:23, Le 10:18, Le 13:2, Le 13:9, Le 14:2; cf. Ez Eze 23:42 (but v. Co VB); sq. [[הֵ֫נׇּה]] Ez Eze 40:4; sq. [[בָּבֶ֫לָה]] Je 27:22; sq. inf. Le 16:27, Ez Eze 30:11; sq. [[מִן]] Je 10:9.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: be introduced, put, sq. [[בְּ]], staves into rings Ex 27:7; vessel into water Le 11:32.
